actually the main difficulty now made
difficult I main challenge that we're
facing is how to make people laugh and
smile what do you think your job is my
job is to make people accept criticism
with a more relaxed mood to hopefully
tell people that it's okay to make fun
of ourselves it's not a bad thing to
make fun over the government even if we
are on the same side because it is a

not that bad as because you know in the

our the challenge that we have is

it's very difficult to tell people to

to be on their side unconditionally
